name: You Are An Idiot Simulator
description:
REST ASSURED: THIS IS NOT A TROJAN OR A VIRUS! IT IS SIMPLY A SIMULATOR THAT I'VE MADE FOR YOU TO GET A GENERAL IDEA ON HOW IT WORKED!

Ah, the 90's! The 2000's! This was when the internet was still in its early stages. Things were improving, problems arose, and solutions for them came along...

The "You Are An Idiot" trojan is a famous example of a "problem" in the internet before.

If you were to go to a certain website (I won't say which), a GIF of smiley faces repeatedly calling you an idiot would play. You close the window... only for 6 more to appear! You close one, and another 6 appear! And before you know it, your computer is becoming sluggish and slow due to the sheer amount of windows bouncing around hogging up your resources!

You will have no choice but to long press the power button for it to shut down, and any unsaved work you were currently working on will go down the drain. You really WERE an idiot for going to that page... (_ _;

If you want to learn more about this trojan, watch this informative YouTube video regarding the topic: 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

This simulator is designed to simulate the trojan that made more than a thousand computers suffer, without making your own be that way!

It also provides an additional mode and a game to keep you entertained!

Hopefully you will enjoy it, it was quite fun and humorous to make (^^

*Note that in some screens you can press the "Escape" key to exit out of them.
